biotools.summary:
Optimal time frequency analysis for biological data.

pyBOAT - A Biological Oscillations Analysis Toolkit.

Tools for time-frequency analysis of noisy time series. The accompanying manuscript "Optimal time frequency analysis for biological data - pyBOAT" can be found here. Questions, comments etc. please to gregor.moenke@embl.de.
